name: Puzzle Plunder
description:
Puzzle Plunder is a Pirate themed match 3 game with stat building elements. Connect and match the icons to overcome obstacles as you sail the vast ocean in search of loot.
Match swords to fight monsters.
Collect buckets to stop your ship from sinking.
Match keys to open chests.
Use your hard earned loot to upgrade your ship.
Use your new found powers to sail further and find MORE loot!
Super relaxed puzzle game
Endless stat progression
Chilled soundtrack
Free!
Consider supporting me and this game by purchasing the "Support" DLC
